28 #ifndef __SearchOps_H_
29 #define __SearchOps_H_
30 
31 // Emulate _findfirst, _findnext on non-Windows platforms
32 
33 
34 
35 #include <string.h>
36 #include <sys/types.h>
37 #include <sys/stat.h>
38 #include <stdlib.h>
39 
40 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
41 
42 
43 #if OGRE_PLATFORM != OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32 && OGRE_PLATFORM != OGRE_PLATFORM_WINRT
44 
45 #include <dirent.h>
46 #include <unistd.h>
47 #include <fnmatch.h>
48 
49 /* Our simplified data entry structure */
50 struct _finddata_t
51 {
52  char *name;
53  int attrib;
54  unsigned long size;
55 };
56 
57 #define _A_NORMAL 0x00 /* Normalfile-Noread/writerestrictions */
58 #define _A_RDONLY 0x01 /* Read only file */
59 #define _A_HIDDEN 0x02 /* Hidden file */
60 #define _A_SYSTEM 0x04 /* System file */
61 #define _A_ARCH 0x20 /* Archive file */
62 #endif
63 #define _A_SUBDIR 0x10 /* Subdirectory */
64 
65 intptr_t _findfirst(const char *pattern, struct _finddata_t *data);
66 int _findnext(intptr_t id, struct _finddata_t *data);
67 int _findclose(intptr_t id);
68 
69 #endif
